response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. I understand its worth to you stands at $1,200,000. After careful consideration, we propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to acquire an item that is not only a testament to quality but also offers significant savings compared to its market value. We believe this offer presents a unique chance for both parties to benefit. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1150000}
